00005 """Visual Studio project reader/writer."""
00006 
00007 import gyp.common
00008 import gyp.easy_xml as easy_xml
00009 
00010 
00011 class Writer(object):
00012   """Visual Studio XML tool file writer."""
00013 
00014   def __init__(self, tool_file_path, name):
00015     """Initializes the tool file.
00016 
00017     Args:
00018       tool_file_path: Path to the tool file.
00019       name: Name of the tool file.
00020     """
00021     self.tool_file_path = tool_file_path
00022     self.name = name
00023     self.rules_section = ['Rules']
00024 
00025   def AddCustomBuildRule(self, name, cmd, description,
00026                          additional_dependencies,
00027                          outputs, extensions):
00028     """Adds a rule to the tool file.
00029 
00030     Args:
00031       name: Name of the rule.
00032       description: Description of the rule.
00033       cmd: Command line of the rule.
00034       additional_dependencies: other files which may trigger the rule.
00035       outputs: outputs of the rule.
00036       extensions: extensions handled by the rule.
00037     """
00038     rule = ['CustomBuildRule',
00039             {'Name': name,
00040              'ExecutionDescription': description,
00041              'CommandLine': cmd,
00042              'Outputs': ';'.join(outputs),
00043              'FileExtensions': ';'.join(extensions),
00044              'AdditionalDependencies':
00045                  ';'.join(additional_dependencies)
00046             }]
00047     self.rules_section.append(rule)
00048 
00049   def WriteIfChanged(self):
00050     """Writes the tool file."""
00051     content = ['VisualStudioToolFile',
00052                {'Version': '8.00',
00053                 'Name': self.name
00054                },
00055                self.rules_section
00056                ]
00057     easy_xml.WriteXmlIfChanged(content, self.tool_file_path,
00058                                encoding="Windows-1252")
